publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3590# Shona Robison: Delivery of Family Planning Services in Dundee-That the Parliament notes with concern the changes being proposed to the delivery of family planning services in Dundee; recognises the important work of well woman clinics like the one in Whitfield which provides a range of family planning and health screening services to women; is further concerned that any closure of that clinic will require women to travel by two buses to the other side of the city in order to access an alternative clinic, and believes that such services are best provided within local communities and that Tayside NHS board should urgently reconsider these proposals.
S1M-3590# Delivery of Family Planning Services in Dundee (lodged on 18 November 2002) Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3590# Delivery of Family Planning Services in Dundee (lodged on 18 November 2002) Colin Campbell*, Kay Ullrich*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr John McAllion*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Fergus Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*, Richard Lochhead*, Fiona Hyslop*, Irene McGugan*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-3590# Delivery of Family Planning Services in Dundee (lodged on 18 November 2002) Roseanna Cunningham*, Mary Scanlon*

S1M-3590# Shona Robison: Delivery of Family Planning Services in Dundeeâ€”That the Parliament notes with concern the changes being proposed to the delivery of family planning services in Dundee; recognises the important work of well woman clinics like the one in Whitfield which provides a range of family planning and health screening services to women; is further concerned that any closure of that clinic will require women to travel by two buses to the other side of the city in order to access an alternative clinic, and believes that such services are best provided within local communities and that Tayside NHS board should urgently reconsider these proposals. Supported by: Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Colin Campbell, Kay Ullrich, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr John McAllion, Mr Adam Ingram, Fergus Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Richard Lochhead, Fiona Hyslop, Irene McGugan, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Roseanna Cunningham, Mary Scanlon
S1M-3590# Delivery of Family Planning Services in Dundee (lodged on 18 November 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3590# Delivery of Family Planning Services in Dundee (lodged on 18 November 2002) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3590# Delivery of Family Planning Services in Dundee (lodged on 18 November 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
